00019 
00020 rlModbus::rlModbus(long max_telegram_length, int _mode, char end_delimitor)
00021 {
00022   if(max_telegram_length < 256) max_telegram_length = 256;
00023   tel = new unsigned char[max_telegram_length];
00024   maxtel = max_telegram_length;
00025   mode = _mode;
00026   delimitor = end_delimitor;
00027   s = NULL;
00028   tty = NULL;
00029 }
00030 
00031 rlModbus::~rlModbus()
00032 {
00033   if(tel != NULL) delete [] tel;
00034 }
00035 
00036 int rlModbus::data2int(const unsigned char *data)
00037 {
00038   return (data[0]*256)+data[1];
00039 }
00040 
00041 int rlModbus::int2data(int val, unsigned char *data)
00042 {
00043   data[0] = (unsigned char) val / 256;
00044   data[1] = (unsigned char) val & 0x0ff;
00045   return 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 int rlModbus::intsize()
00049 {
00050   return 2;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int rlModbus::write(int slave, int function, const unsigned char *data, int datalen, int *transactionID)
00054 {
00055   int len,i;
00056 
00057   if(slave < 0 || slave > 255) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00058   len = 0;
00059   if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00060   {
00061     tel[len++] = ':';
00062     sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X", slave);          len += 2;
00063     sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X", function);       len += 2;
00064     for(i=0; i<datalen; i++)
00065     {
00066       sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X",(int) data[i]); len += 2;
00067       if((len+4) > maxtel) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00068     }
00069     insertLRC(len);                                     len += 2;
00070     tel[len++] = 0x0d;
00071     if(delimitor == 0x0a) tel[len++] = 0x0a;
00072   }
00073   else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00074   {
00075     if(s != NULL)
00076     {
00077       if(transactionID == NULL)
00078       {
00079         tel[len++] = 0;       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID. Not important. Usually zero when making a request, the server will copy them faithfully into the response.
00080         tel[len++] = 0;
00081       }
00082       else
00083       {
00084         tel[len++] = ((*transactionID) & 0xFF00) / 256;         // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID.
00085         tel[len++] = (*transactionID) & 0xFF;
00086       }
00087       tel[len++] = 0;         // bytes 2,3 Protocol number. Must be zero.
00088       tel[len++] = 0;
00089       tel[len++] = 0;         // byte 4 Length (upper byte). Since all requests will be less than 256 bytes in length (!), this will always be zero.
00090       tel[len++] = 2+datalen; // byte 5 Length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00091     }
00092     tel[len++] = (unsigned char) slave;
00093     tel[len++] = (unsigned char) function;
00094     for(i=0; i<datalen; i++)
00095     {
00096       tel[len++] = data[i];
00097       if((len+2) > maxtel) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00098     }
00099     insertCRC(len);                                     len += 2;
00100   }
00101   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00102 
00103   if(s != NULL)
00104   {
00105     if(s->isConnected() == 0)
00106     {
00107       s->connect();
00108       if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00109     }
00110     if(s->write(tel,len-2) < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR; // don't send LRC or CRC
00111   }
00112   else if(tty != NULL)
00113   {
00114     if(tty->writeBlock(tel,len) < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00115   }
00116   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00117   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00118 }
00119 
00120 int rlModbus::request(int slave, int function, int start_adr, int num_register)
00121 {
00122   unsigned char data[4];
00123 
00124   data[0] = (unsigned char) ( start_adr / 256 );
00125   data[1] = (unsigned char) ( start_adr & 0x0ff );
00126   data[2] = (unsigned char) ( num_register / 256 ); 
00127   data[3] = (unsigned char) ( num_register & 0x0ff );
00128   return write(slave, function, data, 4);
00129 }
00130 
00131 int rlModbus::response(int *slave, int *function, unsigned char *data, int timeout)
00132 {
00133   unsigned char *telptr;
00134   int ret,len,byte_count,idata,i,itel,val;
00135 
00136   len = 0;
00137   if(mode != MODBUS_ASCII && mode != MODBUS_RTU) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00138   if(s != NULL)
00139   {
00140     if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00141     if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00142     {
00143       if(s->read((char *) tel, 6, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00144       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID faithfully copied from the request message
00145       // bytes 2,3 Protocol number always zero
00146       // byte 4 Response length (upper byte) Always zero
00147       // byte 5 Response length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00148       // Here comes the normal Modus telegram
00149       if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00150       *slave     = tel[0];
00151       *function  = tel[1];
00152       switch(*function)
00153       {
00154         case ReadCoilStatus:
00155         case ReadInputStatus:
00156         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00157         case ReadInputRegisters:
00158         case FetchCommEventLog:
00159         case ReportSlaveID:
00160         case ReadGeneralReference:
00161         case WriteGeneralReference:
00162         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00163           if(s->read((char *) tel, 1, timeout) <= 0)            return MODBUS_ERROR;
00164           byte_count = tel[0];
00165           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00166           return byte_count;
00167         case ForceSingleCoil:
00168         case PresetSingleRegister:
00169         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00170         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00171         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00172           byte_count = 4;
00173           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00174           return byte_count;
00175         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00176           byte_count = 1;
00177           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00178           return byte_count;
00179         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00180           byte_count = 6;
00181           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00182           return byte_count;
00183         case ReadFifoQueue:
00184           if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0)            return MODBUS_ERROR;
00185           byte_count = tel[0]*256 + tel[1];
00186           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00187           return byte_count;
00188         default:
00189           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00190       }
00191       byte_count = tel[2];
00192       if(s->read((char *) &tel[3], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00193       len = 3;
00194       for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00195       {
00196         data[idata] = buf2int_rtu(&tel[len]); len += 2;
00197       }
00198       data[idata] = 0x0ff;
00199     }
00200   }
00201   else if(tty != NULL)
00202   {
00203     if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00204     {
00205       //printf("modbus ascii\n");
00206       for(i=0; i<maxtel; i++)
00207       {
00208         ret = tty->select(timeout);
00209         if(ret == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00210         //printf("readChar\n");
00211         itel = tty->readChar();
00212         if(itel < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00213         tel[i] = (unsigned char) itel;
00214         if(tel[i] == 0x0d && delimitor != 0x0a) break;
00215         if(tel[i] == 0x0a)                      break;
00216       }
00217       tel[i] = '\0';
00218       telptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((const char *) tel,':');
00219       if(telptr == NULL) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00220       len++;
00221       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",slave);       len += 2;
00222       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",function);    len += 2;
00223       switch(*function)
00224       {
00225         case ReadCoilStatus:
00226         case ReadInputStatus:
00227         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00228         case ReadInputRegisters:
00229         case FetchCommEventLog:
00230         case ReportSlaveID:
00231         case ReadGeneralReference:
00232         case WriteGeneralReference:
00233         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00234           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);    len += 2;
00235           for(idata=0; idata<byte_count; idata++)
00236           {
00237             sscanf((const char *) &telptr[len], "%02X", &val); len += 2;
00238             data[idata] = val;
00239           }
00240           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00241           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00242           return byte_count;
00243         case ForceSingleCoil:
00244         case PresetSingleRegister:
00245         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00246         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00247         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00248           byte_count = 8;
00249           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00250           {
00251             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00252           }
00253           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00254           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00255           return byte_count;
00256         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00257           byte_count = 2;
00258           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00259           {
00260             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00261           }
00262           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00263           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00264           return byte_count;
00265         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00266           byte_count = 12;
00267           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00268           {
00269             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00270           }
00271           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00272           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00273           return byte_count;
00274         case ReadFifoQueue:
00275           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%04X",&byte_count); len += 4;
00276           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00277           {
00278             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00279           }
00280           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00281           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00282           return byte_count;
00283           break;
00284         default:
00285           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00286       }
00287     }
00288     else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00289     {
00290       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00291       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00292       if(tty->readBlock(tel, 2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00293       *slave     = tel[len++];
00294       *function  = tel[len++];
00295       switch(*function)
00296       {
00297         case ReadCoilStatus:
00298         case ReadInputStatus:
00299         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00300         case ReadInputRegisters:
00301         case FetchCommEventLog:
00302         case ReportSlaveID:
00303         case ReadGeneralReference:
00304         case WriteGeneralReference:
00305         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00306           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00307           if(tty->readBlock(&tel[len], 1) <= 0)       return MODBUS_ERROR;
00308           byte_count = tel[len++];
00309           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00310           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00311           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00312           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00313           return byte_count;
00314         case ForceSingleCoil:
00315         case PresetSingleRegister:
00316         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00317         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00318         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00319           byte_count = 4;
00320           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00321           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00322           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00323           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00324           return byte_count;
00325         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00326           byte_count = 1;
00327           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00328           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00329           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00330           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00331           return byte_count;
00332         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00333           byte_count = 6;
00334           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00335           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00336           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00337           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00338           return byte_count;
00339         case ReadFifoQueue:
00340           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00341           if(tty->readBlock(&tel[len], 2) <= 0)       return MODBUS_ERROR;
00342           byte_count = tel[len]*256 + tel[len+1]; len += 2;
00343           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00344           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00345           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00346           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00347           return byte_count;
00348         default:
00349           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00350       }
00351     }
00352   }
00353   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00354   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00355 }
00356 
00357 int rlModbus::readRequest(int *slave, int *function, unsigned char *data, int timeout, int *transactionID)
00358 {
00359   unsigned char *telptr;
00360   int ret,len,byte_count,i,itel,val;
00361 
00362   len = 0;
00363   if(mode != MODBUS_ASCII && mode != MODBUS_RTU) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00364   if(s != NULL)
00365   {
00366     if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00367     if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00368     {
00369       if(s->read((char *) tel, 6, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00370       if(transactionID != NULL) *transactionID = tel[0] * 256 + tel[1]; // return transactionID
00371       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID faithfully copied from the request message
00372       // bytes 2,3 Protocol number always zero
00373       // byte 4 Response length (upper byte) Always zero
00374       // byte 5 Response length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00375       // Here comes the normal Modus telegram
00376       if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00377       *slave     = tel[0];
00378       *function  = tel[1];
00379       switch(*function)
00380       {
00381         case ReadCoilStatus:
00382         case ReadInputStatus:
00383         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00384         case ReadInputRegisters:
00385         case ForceSingleCoil:
00386         case PresetSingleRegister:
00387           if(s->read((char *) data, 4, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00388           return 4;
00389         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00390         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00391         case FetchCommEventLog:
00392         case ReportSlaveID:
00393           return 0;
00394         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00395         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00396           if(s->read((char *) data, 5, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00397           byte_count = data[4];
00398           if(s->read((char *) &data[4], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00399           return 4+byte_count;
00400         case ReadGeneralReference:
00401         case WriteGeneralReference:
00402           if(s->read((char *) data, 1, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00403           byte_count = data[0];
00404           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)     return MODBUS_ERROR;
00405           return byte_count;
00406         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00407           if(s->read((char *) data, 6, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00408           return 6;
00409         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00410           if(s->read((char *) data, 9, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00411           byte_count = data[8];
00412           if(s->read((char *) &data[8], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00413           return 8+byte_count;
00414         case ReadFifoQueue:
00415           if(s->read((char *) data, 2, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00416           return 2;
00417         default:
00418           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00419       }
00420     }
00421   }
00422   else if(tty != NULL)
00423   {
00424     if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00425     {
00426       //printf("modbus ascii\n");
00427       for(i=0; i<maxtel; i++)
00428       {
00429         ret = tty->select(timeout);
00430         if(ret == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00431         //printf("readChar\n");
00432         itel = tty->readChar();
00433         if(itel < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00434         tel[i] = (unsigned char) itel;
00435         if(tel[i] == 0x0d && delimitor != 0x0a) break;
00436         if(tel[i] == 0x0a)                      break;
00437       }
00438       tel[i] = '\0';
00439       telptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((const char *) tel,':');
00440       if(telptr == NULL) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00441       len++;
00442       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",slave);       len += 2;
00443       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",function);    len += 2;
00444       switch(*function)
00445       {
00446         case ReadCoilStatus:
00447         case ReadInputStatus:
00448         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00449         case ReadInputRegisters:
00450         case ForceSingleCoil:
00451         case PresetSingleRegister:
00452           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00453           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00454           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00455           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00456           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00457           return 4;
00458         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00459         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00460         case FetchCommEventLog:
00461         case ReportSlaveID:
00462           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00463           return 0;
00464         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00465         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00466           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00467           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00468           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00469           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00470           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                         len += 2;
00471           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00472           {
00473             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4+i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00474           }
00475           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00476           return 4+byte_count;
00477         case ReadGeneralReference:
00478         case WriteGeneralReference:
00479           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                           len += 2;
00480           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00481           {
00482             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00483           }
00484           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00485           return byte_count;
00486         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00487           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00488           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00489           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00490           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00491           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00492           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[5] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00493           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00494           return 6;
00495         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00496           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00497           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00498           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00499           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00500           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00501           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[5] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00502           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[6] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00503           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[7] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00504           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                         len += 2;
00505           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00506           {
00507             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[8+i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00508           }
00509           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00510           return 8+byte_count;
00511         case ReadFifoQueue:
00512           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00513           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00514           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00515           return 2;
00516         default:
00517           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00518       }
00519     }
00520     else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00521     {
00522       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00523       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00524       if(tty->readBlock(tel, 2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00525       *slave     = tel[len++];
00526       *function  = tel[len++];
00527       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00528       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00529       switch(*function)
00530       {
00531         case ReadCoilStatus:
00532         case ReadInputStatus:
00533         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00534         case ReadInputRegisters:
00535         case ForceSingleCoil:
00536         case PresetSingleRegister:
00537           if(tty->readBlock(data, 4+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00538           memcpy(&tel[len],data,4+2); len += 4+2;
00539           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00540           return 4;
00541         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00542         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00543         case FetchCommEventLog:
00544         case ReportSlaveID:
00545           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00546           return 0;
00547         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00548         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00549           if(tty->readBlock(data, 5) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00550           memcpy(&tel[len],data,5); len += 5;
00551           byte_count = data[4];
00552           if(tty->readBlock(&data[4], byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00553           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00554           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00555           return 4+byte_count;
00556         case ReadGeneralReference:
00557         case WriteGeneralReference:
00558           if(tty->readBlock(data, 1) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00559           memcpy(&tel[len],data,1); len++;
00560           byte_count = data[0];
00561           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0)     return MODBUS_ERROR;
00562           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00563           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00564           return byte_count;
00565         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00566           if(tty->readBlock(data, 6+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00567           memcpy(&tel[len],data,6+2); len += 6+2;
00568           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00569           return 6;
00570         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00571           if(tty->readBlock(data, 9) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00572           memcpy(&tel[len],data,9); len += 9;
00573           byte_count = data[8];
00574           if(tty->readBlock(&data[8], byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00575           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00576           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00577           return 8+byte_count;
00578         case ReadFifoQueue:
00579           if(tty->readBlock(data, 2+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00580           memcpy(&tel[len],data,2+2); len += 2+2;
00581           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00582           return 2;
00583         default:
00584           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00585       }
00586     }
00587   }
00588   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00589   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00590 }
00591 
00592 void rlModbus::registerSocket(rlSocket *socket)
00593 {
00594   tty = NULL;
00595   s = socket;
00596 }
00597 
00598 void rlModbus::registerSerial(rlSerial *serial)
00599 {
00600   s = NULL;
00601   tty = serial;
00602 }

00604 int rlModbus::buf2int_rtu(unsigned char *buf)
00605 {
00606   return (buf[0]*256 + buf[1]);
00607 }
00608 
00609 void rlModbus::int2buf_rtu(int i, unsigned char *buf)
00610 {
00611   int high, low;
00612 
00613   high = i / 256;
00614   low  = i & 0x0ff;
00615   buf[0] = (unsigned char) high;
00616   buf[1] = (unsigned char) low;
00617 }
00618 
00619 int rlModbus::buf2int_ascii(unsigned char *buf)
00620 {
00621   int val;
00622 
00623   sscanf((char *) buf,"%04X",&val);
00624   return val;
00625 }
00626 
00627 void rlModbus::int2buf_ascii(int i, unsigned char *buf)
00628 {
00629   sprintf((char *) buf,"%04X",i);
00630 }
00631 
00632 void rlModbus::insertLRC(int len)
00633 {
00634   unsigned char lrc;
00635   int i,high,low,val;
00636 
00637   if(len < 0) return;
00638   lrc = 0;
00639   for(i=1; i<len; i+=2) // exclude starting ':' and trailing <CR><LF>
00640   {
00641     sscanf((const char *) &tel[i],   "%1X", &high);
00642     sscanf((const char *) &tel[i+1], "%1X", &low);
00643     val = high*16 + low;
00644     lrc += val;
00645   }
00646   lrc = ((unsigned char)(-((char) lrc)));
00647   sprintf((char *) &tel[len],"%02X",(unsigned int) lrc);
00648 }
00649 
00650 int rlModbus::LRCerror(int len)
00651 {
00652   unsigned char *cptr;
00653   unsigned char lrc;
00654   int i,high,low,val;
00655 
00656   if(len < 0) return 1;
00657   tel[maxtel-1] = '\0';
00658   cptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((char *)tel,':');
00659   if(cptr == NULL) return 1;
00660   cptr++;
00661   lrc = 0;
00662   for(i=1; i<len+2; i+=2) // exclude starting ':' and trailing <CR><LF>
00663   {                       // len is without lrc -> len+2
00664     sscanf((const char *) cptr++, "%1X", &high);
00665     sscanf((const char *) cptr++, "%1X", &low);
00666     val = high*16 + low;
00667     lrc += val;
00668   }
00669   if(lrc == 0) return 0; // lrc ok
00670   return 1;              // lrc error
00671 }

00734 
00735 void rlModbus::insertCRC(int len)
00736 {
00737   unsigned char crc_high, crc_low;
00738   unsigned index;
00739   int i;
00740 
00741   if(len < 0) return;
00742   crc_high = crc_low = 0xff;
00743   for(i=0; i<len; i++)
00744   {
00745     index = crc_low ^ tel[i];
00746     crc_low  = crc_high ^ array_crc_low[index];
00747     crc_high = array_crc_high[index];
00748   }
00749   tel[len]   = crc_low;
00750   tel[len+1] = crc_high;
00751 }
00752 
00753 int rlModbus::CRCerror(int len)
00754 {
00755   unsigned char crc_high, crc_low;
00756   unsigned index;
00757   int i;
00758 
00759   if(len < 2) return 1;
00760   crc_high = crc_low = 0xff;
00761   for(i=0; i<len-2; i++)
00762   {
00763     index = crc_low ^ tel[i];
00764     crc_low  = crc_high ^ array_crc_low[index];
00765     crc_high = array_crc_high[index];
00766   }
00767   if(crc_low  != tel[len-2]) return 1;
00768   if(crc_high != tel[len-1]) return 1;
00769   return 0;
00770 }
